title: TokBox Demonstrates the Power of Live Video at Integrate Conference 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/28/2015 @ 8:00 AM   TokBox Inc. 
SAN FRANCISCO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/28/15 -- TokBox , a Telefónica company, will be demonstrating its leading WebRTC platform, OpenTok, at Integrate Conference 2015 in Santa Clara. TokBox will demonstrate a range of capabilities including embeddable real-time video and voice communications within websites and mobile applications. TokBox is also a sponsor of the Integrate 2015 Hackathon where teams of developers will compete using open technologies to build applications from scratch. 
The event, held September 28-30, is the world's largest technology conference focused on integrating technologies as well as the growth of the open web from open API's to open web content and open communication. 
TokBox develops and operates the OpenTok platform, a global cloud platform for embedding live video, voice, messaging and screen sharing experiences into websites and mobile applications. The scalable, customizable platform gives users the creative freedom to develop any video interaction, from one-to-one chats to large-scale multiparty broadcasts. 
The OpenTok platform is powering a growing number of innovative applications built by startups and enterprises that are leveraging WebRTC to embed real-time communications and creating rich, contextual and intuitive experiences. Driven by technology platforms such as OpenTok, companies are revolutionizing entire industries offering services such as virtual medical consultations and live diagnostics, interactive educational tutorials, remote team collaboration and real-time customer support. 
At Integrate 2015, TokBox will demo Calgary Scientific and its OpenTok-powered health application, Resolution MD® -- a diagnostic and medical imaging collaboration software. TokBox CTO, Badri Rajasekar will also discuss the revolution happening in communications and explore how embedded technologies are allowing companies to create whole new contextual and meaningful experiences. 
Badri commented, "TokBox and the WebRTC community shares the same vision as Integrate 2015 to support the growth of open and integrated technologies. We're driven by empowering companies to build innovative applications with embedded real-time communications. From customer service to corporate finance, health to robotics, TokBox is excited to be enabling the next generation of applications and be at the centre of a major shift happening in communications." 
Attendees of Integrate Conference 2015 are invited to visit TokBox at Booth 315. 
About TokBox TokBox, a Telefónica company, develops and operates the OpenTok Platform, making it fast and easy to embed live video, voice and messaging communications into online and mobile websites, apps and services. The scalable, customizable platform gives users the creative freedom to develop any video and voice interaction, from one-to-one chats to large-scale broadcasts. 
The first platform to incorporate support for WebRTC, OpenTok caters to enterprises, entrepreneurs and developers with powerful APIs and a global cloud infrastructure. OpenTok has been used to add video communications to more than 100,000 services by companies including Mozilla, Major League Baseball, Valspar, Bridgestone Golf, Diet Coke, Ford, Doritos and Double Robotics.
